page.title: 06POPULATION
page.content: About 300 people live in the four hamlets of Woolston,Blackford Compton Pauncefoot and Maperton of which 1/3 constitutes the working population.The rest are housewives, children and the retired. The non-agrarian population tend to be well- off professional people working in nearby towns(Yeovil, Sherborne and Wincanton) and even London.Also a few naval and airline pilot families live in the area. The number of children within the area continues to fall while the average age continues to rise as the retired section of the population steadily increases. The population increases a little in the summer when a number of families come to live in holiday houses and week-end cottages.
